title: Mental Health Awareness App
description: Developed an app using the MERN stack and Expo. Main features included: users and user management, user data synchronized with database, functional user inferface, integration with Tumblr API, AI based recommendation system with Tensorflow.js

title: Battle Ship
description: Took over, refactored, and cleaned up an existing implementation of BattleShip. Converted the user interface to a GUI from CLI. Added graphics using PyGame. Implemented additional functionality building on the previous version.

title: IMA Math-to-Industry Boot Camp
description: A summer boot camp aimed at taking graduate students from math and training them to be data scientists. Included a crash course in stochastic methods, machine learning, R, and Python. My final project trained an agent using reinforcement learning to efficiently manage incoming orders and disptach orders in a large warehouse.
